title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Ms. Emanuela Claudia Del Re

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Ms. Emanuela Claudia Del Re, European Union Special Representative for the Sahel on Monday, 22nd April, 2024.
The meeting held on the sidelines of the High Level African Counter-Terrorism Summit in Abuja (22nd – 23rd April, 2024). Discussed issues relating to Nigeria-EU partnership as well as regional matters.
The visiting EU Envoy was accompanied to the Ministry by Ambassador Samuela Isopi, Head of EU Delegation to Nigeria.
